trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kearny
There were no other sightings in Kearny on or around June 17th 2012
Summary: There was a flashing, starlike, super fast object
divs: Sighting DetailsMy lovely lady friend and I were sitting next to Quikstop, enjoying a cigarette. We were looking at the sky when we saw this fast moving, glowing, planet-like thing off in the distance, real high. Real crazy!! It was like, in the ozone layer high. But yeah. It looked like a star. Or planet. That was moving really fast, and glowing like a star. AH!! ;X
